trans-unit.source: Provides information specifying how acceleration should be performed on a spin box (also known as an up-down control) when the up or down button is pressed for specified time period.
trans-unit.target: 提供信息以指定应如何在数字显示框 （也称为 up-down 控件） 上执行加速时向上或向下按钮指定的时间段内按。

trans-unit.source: The NumericUpDownAcceleration object is used by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown> control to optionally provide acceleration when incrementing or decrementing the control through a large quantity of numbers.
trans-unit.target: 使用 NumericUpDownAcceleration 对象<xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>控件来控制通过数量大的数字 （可选） 提供加速时递增或递减。</xref:System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDown>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.NumericUpDownAcceleration"></xref> class.
The number of seconds the up or down button is pressed before the acceleration starts.
trans-unit.target: 数秒向上或向下按钮前按下加速开始。

trans-unit.source: The quantity the value displayed in the control should be incremented or decremented during acceleration.
trans-unit.target: 该数量在控件中显示的值应为递增或递减在加速过程。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the quantity to increment or decrement the displayed value during acceleration.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要递增或递减在加速期间显示的值的数量。

trans-unit.source: The quantity to increment or decrement the displayed value during acceleration.
trans-unit.target: 要递增或递减在加速期间显示的值的数量。

trans-unit.source: The set value is less than 0.
Gets or sets the number of seconds the up or down button must be pressed before the acceleration starts.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的秒数向上或向下按钮必须按加速开始前。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the number of seconds the up or down button must be pressed before the acceleration starts.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置的秒数向上或向下按钮必须按加速开始前。

trans-unit.source: The set value is less than 0.
